tbForm directive in tubular.directives

The tbForm directive is the base to create any form. You can define a dataService and a modelKey to autoload a record. The serverSaveUrl can be used to create a new or update an existing record.

Directive's attributes

Param Type Details
serverUrl string

Set the HTTP URL where the data comes.
serverSaveUrl string

Set the HTTP URL where the data will be saved.
serverSaveMethod string

Set HTTP Method to save data.
model object

The object model to show in the form.
isNew boolean

Set if the form is for create a new record.
modelKey string

Defines the fields to use like Keys.
formName string

Defines the form name.
serviceName string

Define Data service (name) to retrieve data, defaults tubularHttp.
requireAuthentication bool

Set if authentication check must be executed, default true.
